title: Deep Sea Nami bug
body: Has anyone noticed that on this last patch... deep sea nami's mohawk (what I call it) is now folded in at the top or is it just me?! Its really bothering me lol

replies.body:
Heya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are in the process of a fix. It appears to be a weighting issue with the lure. :c
It's a funny thing I noticed too. didn't know if it was a bug or if it was intended.
Lol! I tried it during game xD that's great. I do love having my full mohawk though xD it's beautiful
It's a lure. It's a funny bug, because if you /laugh joke or taunt it disappears, but when you /dance it grows back XD
